name: Scoot (Uppon Hill)
description:
A Smash bros clone made for Ludwig Jam 2023 in 10 days, solo.

Very happy with the state of the game, but also it's easy to see where this could have got to with another week. There are lots of little gaps that would be simple to fill with content, sfx, graphics, music etc. Still, I've had a ton of fun making it and playing it. Enjoy!

Best played with a Switch Pro / Xbox Elite / PS Dualsense or similar gamepad style controller.

Controls:

ActionKeyboardGamepadMenuEnter / ReturnStart / MenuMoveWASD / Arrow KeysLeft Analog Stick / DPad
JumpZ / LRight Face ButtonNormal AttackX / KBottom Face ButtonSpecial AttackC / JRight Face ButtonShield(temporarily bugged!)Right Trigger
